name: Freeport-McMoRan Inc.
summary: Freeport-McMoRan Inc. is a leading international metals mining company, recognized as the world’s largest producer of molybdenum and a major producer of copper and gold. Headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, Freeport operates globally significant mining assets, including the Grasberg minerals district in Indonesia and large-scale operations in North and South America. The company is committed to responsible production and sustainable practices, holding industry certifications such as the Copper Mark at all its copper-producing sites.
